title: the C# build event not run output folder
body:
_This issue has been moved from [a ticket on Developer Community](https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/t/the-C-build-event-not-run-output-folder/10613588)._

---
The batch file itself runs from the output folder, for example, bin/Debug.  from the [https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/ide/how-to-specify-build-events-csharp?view=vs-2022#create-the-build-event-commands](create-the-build-event-commands)
how ever ,on my  Visual Studio the  Microsoft Visual Studio Enterprise 2022 (64 位) - Current 17.9.1
the post build event run in the  "Driver:\GIt\{project Name}" not in the  "Driver:\GIt\{project Name}\bin\Debug"
the behavior not same with docs https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/ide/how-to-specify-build-events-csharp?view=vs-2022#create-the-build-event-commands

---
### Original Comments

#### Feedback Bot on 3/13/2024, 06:03 AM: 

(private comment, text removed)

---
### Original Solutions
(no solutions)

nodes.body: Team triage: the behavior is correct; the documentation needs to be changed according to it.
